snippet: The Bard Music Festival devoted the first of two straight weekends to Camille Saint-Saëns.
abstract: Steve Smith discusses programs at the first of two weekends devoted to French composer Camille Saint-Saens at the Bard Music Festival.
lead_paragraph: The Bard Music Festival devoted the first of two straight weekends to Camille Saint-Saëns.

headline.seo: A Bard Music Festival Weekend of Saint-Saëns
headline.main: Celebrating a Once-Mighty Tree, Pruned but Hardly Forgotten
headline.print_headline: Celebrating a Once-Mighty Tree, Pruned but Hardly Forgotten
